name: COMPANY Bluechip Fund
description: An open-ended equity scheme predominantly investing in large-cap stocks.

name: COMPANY Balanced Fund
description: An open-ended hybrid scheme investing predominantly in equity and equity-related instruments.

name: COMPANY Tax Saver Fund
description: An open-ended equity-linked saving scheme with a statutory lock-in of 3 years and tax benefits.

name: COMPANY Midcap Fund
description: An open-ended equity scheme investing in emerging mid-cap companies with high growth potential.

name: COMPANY Smallcap Fund
description: A high-risk, high-return scheme investing in small-cap stocks with undiscovered potential.

name: COMPANY Liquid Fund
description: A low-risk debt fund for parking surplus cash for short periods. High liquidity.

name: COMPANY Nifty 50 Index Fund
description: A passively managed fund that mirrors the Nifty 50 index. Low cost and broad market exposure.

name: COMPANY Corporate Bond Fund
description: Invests in high-quality corporate bonds, aiming for stable returns with moderate risk.

name: COMPANY Global Equity Fund
description: Invests in a diversified portfolio of global stocks, giving you exposure to international markets.

name: COMPANY Gold Fund
description: An open-ended fund that invests in Gold ETFs, providing a hedge against inflation.
